edu.ncsu.csc216.airport_customs.queues

Class CustomsDesk

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.airport_customs.queues.CustomsDesk
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransitSystem

    public class CustomsDesk
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransitSystem
    This class represents the customs desks in our airport simulator. It is responsible for being the final place passengers go before finally being processed and leaving the airport (simulator). This class implements the TransitSystem interface to help fulfill these responsibilities and also contains a PassengerQueue line where the passengers wait before being processed by their respective customs desk.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Adams Ombonga

    • Method Detail

      • addToLine

        public void addToLine(Passenger nextPass)
        This method is responsible for add a passenger to the end of the selected passengers customs desk line. Once done the passengers wait time is calculated as well as the time when the line will next be available (empty). Lastly the condition for waitingProcessing is set to true because the passenger is now waiting in line to be processed.
        Parameters:
        nextPass - passenger parameter containing the next passenger passed to this customs desk line

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        Method used to determine if there are still passengers to be processed
        Specified by:
        hasNext in interface TransitSystem
        Returns:
        true if the line still has passengers, false otherwise

      • processNext

        public Passenger processNext()
        Method used to log the information for the passenger in the front of the line. Once this is completed that passenger is removed from the line and moves on with their processing.
        Specified by:
        processNext in interface TransitSystem
        Returns:
        the removed passenger to be processed.

      • departTimeNext

        public int departTimeNext()
        Method used to determine when the front passenger in the queue will leave the customs desk line. Return the Integer.MAX_VALUE if the line is empty
        Specified by:
        departTimeNext in interface TransitSystem
        Returns:
        time when current passenger will leave the customs desk line, return Integer.MAX_VALUE if the line is empty

      • size

        public int size()
        Method used to find the remaining number of passengers waiting in line
        Specified by:
        size in interface TransitSystem
        Returns:
        number of passengers still waiting in line
